name: Ntc1Sensor
comment: Temperature in solar flow (from solar collector)

name: Ntc2Sensor
comment: Temperature in solar back flow (to solar collector)

name: DateAndTimeIsSet
comment: 0: Date and Time is not set; 1: Date and Time is set

name: CurrentFlow
comment: Flow thru buffer circuit if loading the storage

name: InternalHwcTempDesired
comment: Temperature target for DHW loading if solar module is in stand alone appliccation without external control

name: InternalHcTempDesired
comment: Temperature target for CW loading if solar module is in stand alone appliccation without external control

name: CountryZone
comment: Standort der f端r den Sonnenkalender herangezogen wird. Siehe Anleitung

name: RequestForExternalDateTimeSetting
comment: 0: Time and Date is set; 1: Time and Date is not set

name: YieldCurrentDay
comment: Accumulated solar gain from 00:00 to 24:00 if time is set

name: ForceStartSolPumpKick
comment: Startet die Kollektorpumpe f端r maximal 5 Minuten um die Kollektortemperatur zu 端berpr端fen.0 = aus1 = ein

name: MonitorMatlabState
comment: main states: 201: Waiting; 209: Loading; 41: Night Modus

name: MonitorOverheatState
comment: 111: Waiting; 112 and 113: Temperature to high; 220 and 221: In Overheat protection
